import React from "react"; import classes from "./Truck.module.css"; import { Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; const truck = props => { return (

{props.brand} {props.model}

  • Price: {props.price}
  • License plate: {props.licensePlate}
  • Country: {props.country}
  • Age (years): {props.years}
); }; export default truck;
